article: Many years ago, when I was in high school and working on weekends, I lost my wallet. After adding gas to my old car, I paid, and  _  my wallet at the gas station. I hadn't even had time to  _  I had lost it when my phone rang. A man asked me if I had lost my wallet. I  searched for  my purse and to my  _  , I had. He asked me to  _  him what was in it. I did so. He then told me where to  pick up  my wallet. When I reached his  _  , I noticed his wheelchair and a slope going up to the house. I thought that it might have been  _  for him to lower his body and pick up my wallet. I knocked on the door and he told me to come in. I  _  him for finding my wallet. While I didn't want to insult him by offering  _  , I really felt like  _  something. So I asked him if there was anything I could do to repay his  _  , and he said, "Just pass it on. "I said I would be  _  to do that. I was raised to be honest in any case and I would have done so,  _  promising this fellow I would, but I wanted to  _  his kindness, so I promised I would.
